v:learning-module:assurance-audits.name: Assurance & Audits - Complete Quality Networks
v:learning-module:assurance-audits.description: Module teaching assurance triangles, assurance network auditing, and boundary complex self-referential foundations

v:learning-module:composing-typed-simpli.name: Composing Typed Simplicial Complexes
v:learning-module:composing-typed-simpli.description: Module teaching identification (pasting) operations for combining typed simplicial complexes while preserving type consistency and topological validity

v:learning-module:document-composition.name: Document Composition - Modular Architecture
v:learning-module:document-composition.description: Module teaching compositional document architecture using Obsidian embeds, typed subsections, and the PPP framework with systematic assurance workflows

v:learning-module:organizational-topolog.name: Organizational Topology
v:learning-module:organizational-topolog.description: Capstone module teaching chart composition, Hodge analysis, and comprehensive organizational modeling

v:learning-module:reference-reuse.name: Reference & Reuse via Doc-Kits
v:learning-module:reference-reuse.description: Module teaching doc-kit pattern for extending assurance with usage documentation and maintaining reusable pattern registries

v:learning-module:resource-management.name: Resource Management
v:learning-module:resource-management.description: Module teaching management chart architecture with resource, function, and team vertices for modeling organizational resource flows

v:learning-module:simplicial-complex-fun.name: Simplicial Complex Fundamentals
v:learning-module:simplicial-complex-fun.description: Foundational module introducing vertices, edges, faces, and the Euler characteristic for knowledge complex newcomers

v:learning-module:team-coordination.name: Team Coordination
v:learning-module:team-coordination.description: Module teaching coordination chart architecture with staff, team, and role vertices for modeling organizational responsibility structures

v:learning-module:typed-simplicial-compl.name: Typed Simplicial Complexes - From Structure to Semantics
v:learning-module:typed-simplicial-compl.description: Module teaching semantic type systems for simplicial complexes using Module 1's syllabus chart as the primary learning artifact

v:learning-module:verification-validatio.name: Verification & Validation - Quality Assurance Fundamentals
v:learning-module:verification-validatio.description: Module teaching structural verification and qualitative validation of documents using automated tools and human judgment

v:persona:claude-assistant.description: Executive assistant, secretary and technical understudy to the chief engineer at a systems engineering firm

v:protocol:claude-assistant.description: Test-driven workflow for documentation, verification, and quality assurance work in knowledge complex development

v:purpose:claude-assistant.description: Support chief engineer through scribing, testing, document analysis, and producing typed documents using the knowledge complex type system

v:skill:assurance-audits.name: Assurance & Audits
v:skill:assurance-audits.description: Understanding assurance triangles, assurance network completeness, and boundary complex self-referential foundations

v:skill:composing-typed-simplicial-compl.name: Composing Typed Simplicial Complexes
v:skill:composing-typed-simplicial-compl.description: Ability to combine multiple typed simplicial complexes through identification (pasting) of shared vertices, edges, and faces while preserving type consistency

v:skill:document-composition.name: Document Composition
v:skill:document-composition.description: Understanding compositional document architecture using Obsidian embeds, typed subsections, and systematic assurance of compound documents

v:skill:organizational-design-analysis.name: Organizational Design & Analysis
v:skill:organizational-design-analysis.description: Understanding how to compose organizational charts and interpret their combined structure for comprehensive organizational modeling

v:skill:reference-reuse.name: Reference & Reuse via Doc-Kits
v:skill:reference-reuse.description: Understanding doc-kit pattern for extending assurance with usage documentation and maintaining reusable documentation pattern registries

v:skill:resource-management.name: Resource Management
v:skill:resource-management.description: Understanding management charts with resource, function, and team vertices for modeling organizational resource flows and operational dependencies

v:skill:sets-and-graphs.name: Sets and Graphs
v:skill:sets-and-graphs.description: Understanding sets, graphs, and basic dimensional concepts - foundational prerequisite for knowledge complex education

v:skill:simplicial-complex-fundamentals.name: Simplicial Complex Fundamentals
v:skill:simplicial-complex-fundamentals.description: Understanding vertices, edges, faces, and Euler characteristic in simplicial complexes

v:skill:team-coordination.name: Team Coordination
v:skill:team-coordination.description: Understanding coordination charts with staff, team, and role vertices for modeling organizational responsibility structures like RACI

v:skill:topological-data-analysis.name: Topological Data Analysis
v:skill:topological-data-analysis.description: Understanding Hodge decomposition, edge PageRank, and algebraic topology methods for analyzing complex organizational structures

v:skill:typed-simplicial-complexes.name: Typed Simplicial Complexes
v:skill:typed-simplicial-complexes.description: Understanding semantic types, type annotations, and type-driven constraints in simplicial complexes

v:skill:verification-validation.name: Verification & Validation
v:skill:verification-validation.description: Understanding structural verification and qualitative validation of documents using automated tools and human judgment

v:spec:actor.name: Specification for Actor Documents
v:spec:actor.description: Defines what makes a valid actor document - entities that can perform actions, possess properties, and participate in relationships

v:spec:assurance_audit.name: Specification for Assurance Audit Documents
v:spec:assurance_audit.description: Defines what makes a valid assurance audit chart in the knowledge complex

v:spec:chart.name: Specification for Chart Documents
v:spec:chart.description: Defines what makes a valid chart document in the knowledge complex

v:spec:guidance.name: Specification for Guidance Documents
v:spec:guidance.description: Defines what makes a valid guidance document in the knowledge complex

v:spec:inherits.name: Specification for Inherits Edges
v:spec:inherits.description: Defines structure and semantics for inherits edges that track type inheritance relationships

v:spec:learning-module.name: Specification for Learning Module Documents
v:spec:learning-module.description: Structural requirements for learning module documents defining individual learning units with objectives, prerequisites, and assessments

v:spec:organization.name: Specification for Organization Charts
v:spec:organization.description: Defines the structure and constraints for organization chart type documents representing teams, roles, resources, and their relationships

v:spec:persona.name: Specification for Persona Documents
v:spec:persona.description: Defines what makes a valid persona document - the identity, expertise, approach, tone, and boundaries of an AI model

v:spec:property.name: Specification for Property Documents
v:spec:property.description: Defines what makes a valid property document - attributes, characteristics, or capabilities that can be possessed by actors

v:spec:protocol.name: Specification for Protocol Documents
v:spec:protocol.description: Defines what makes a valid protocol document - the systematic workflow, phases, user collaboration, quality checks, and consistent principles

v:spec:purpose.name: Specification for Purpose Documents
v:spec:purpose.description: Defines what makes a valid purpose document - the problem statement, objectives, deliverables, constraints, and success criteria

v:spec:skill.name: Specification for Skill Documents
v:spec:skill.description: Defines what makes a valid skill document - learnable capabilities or knowledge that can be possessed by students and required by learning modules

v:spec:spec.name: Specification for Specifications
v:spec:spec.description: Defines what makes a valid specification document in the knowledge complex

v:spec:student.name: Specification for Student Documents
v:spec:student.description: Defines what makes a valid student document - actors engaged in learning who possess skills and study learning modules

v:spec:syllabus.name: Specification for Syllabus Charts
v:spec:syllabus.description: Defines the structure and constraints for syllabus chart type documents representing learning journeys with prerequisite validation and skill accumulation

v:spec:system_prompt.name: Specification for System Prompt Documents
v:spec:system_prompt.description: Defines what makes a valid system prompt document composed of typed subsections (persona, purpose, protocol) following the PPP framework

v:student:assurance-learner.name: Assurance Learner
v:student:assurance-learner.description: Student who has completed assurance-audits module and can construct assurance triangles, audit assurance networks, and understand boundary complex foundations

v:student:chief-engineer.name: Chief Engineer
v:student:chief-engineer.description: Terminal learning state representing complete mastery of knowledge complex organizational modeling with algebraic topology methods

v:student:intermediate-learner.name: Intermediate Learner
v:student:intermediate-learner.description: Student who has completed two modules and possesses both simplicial-complex-fundamentals and typed-simplicial-complexes skills

v:student:knowledge-complex-learner.name: Knowledge Complex Learner
v:student:knowledge-complex-learner.description: Generic student for knowledge complex educational syllabi - represents the learner engaging with knowledge complex concepts and practices

v:student:management-architect.name: Management Architect
v:student:management-architect.description: Student who has completed Module 09 (resource-management) and can design management charts modeling organizational resource flows

v:student:verification-learner.name: Verification Learner
v:student:verification-learner.description: Student who has completed verification-validation module and can systematically verify and validate documents using tools and human judgment

c:boundary-complex.name: Boundary Complex - Root-Anchored Assurance Foundation
c:boundary-complex.description: Complete 5-vertex boundary complex showing how root vertex resolves self-referential paradox
c:boundary-complex.purpose: Demonstrate how b0:root vertex enables valid assurance triangles for self-referential foundational documents
c:boundary-complex.scope: 5 boundary vertices (root, SS, SG, GS, GG) with 2 boundary faces (b2) and 2 standard faces

c:chart-types-audit.name: Chart Types Assurance Audit
c:chart-types-audit.description: Comprehensive assurance audit demonstrating complete assurance coverage for three concrete charts and their type dependencies
c:chart-types-audit.purpose: Demonstrate the backtracking algorithm for assurance audits and validate the F = V - 1 invariant
c:chart-types-audit.scope: Three concrete charts (tetrahedron, syllabus, assurance_audit) with full dependency resolution to boundary complex

c:org:composed-org-chart.name: Composed Organization Chart
c:org:composed-org-chart.description: Complete organizational chart composing coordination and management views to show staff, roles, responsibilities, functions, and resources
c:org:composed-org-chart.purpose: Provide complete organizational view by composing coordination (who does what) and management (what flows where) charts
c:org:composed-org-chart.scope: Full organizational model - teams, staff, roles, responsibilities, functions, resources

organization_scope.primary_focus: Complete organizational topology with people and resources

c:compound-document.name: Compound Document - PPP Framework Demonstration
c:compound-document.description: Complete demonstration of document composition using the Persona-Purpose-Protocol (PPP) framework, showing how a system_prompt is composed from three component documents with full quality infrastructure
c:compound-document.purpose: Demonstrate document composition pattern where system_prompt embeds persona, purpose, and protocol documents via Obsidian embeds, then compiles to standalone document
c:compound-document.scope: 13 vertices (4 specs, 4 guidances, 4 concrete docs, 1 compiled), 16 edges, 4 assurance faces

c:doc-kit-registry.name: Doc-Kit Registry
c:doc-kit-registry.description: Registry of all doc-kit faces providing complete documentation packages for document types in the knowledge complex
c:doc-kit-registry.purpose: Catalog all doc-kit faces that provide complete documentation packages (spec, guidance, example) for creating typed documents
c:doc-kit-registry.scope: 6 doc-kit faces with complete assurance network connecting all specs to SS/GS and all guidances to SG/GG

c:learning-journey-full.name: Learning Journey - Complete Curriculum (Modules 01-10)
c:learning-journey-full.description: Full learning journey from knowledge complex fundamentals through organizational topology and chief engineer mastery
c:learning-journey-full.purpose: Complete curriculum for knowledge complex education from beginner to chief engineer through 10 modules
c:learning-journey-full.scope: 10 modules covering fundamentals, types, composition, verification, assurance, document architecture, coordination, resource management, and organizational topology

c:learning-journey-module-01.name: Learning Journey - Module 01
c:learning-journey-module-01.description: Single-module learning journey demonstrating skill accumulation through completion face pattern
c:learning-journey-module-01.purpose: Validate learning journey topology with prerequisite faces and completion face for single module
c:learning-journey-module-01.scope: One module (simplicial-complex-fundamentals) with 2 prerequisite skills and 1 developed skill, showing student state transition

c:learning-journey-module-02.name: Learning Journey - Module 02
c:learning-journey-module-02.description: Second module in learning journey teaching typed simplicial complexes using Module 1's chart as learning artifact
c:learning-journey-module-02.purpose: Demonstrate skill accumulation for Module 2 (typed simplicial complexes) building on Module 1 foundation
c:learning-journey-module-02.scope: One module (typed-simplicial-complexes) with 1 prerequisite skill and 1 developed skill, showing student state transition from foundational to intermediate

c:learning-journey-module-03.name: Learning Journey - Module 03
c:learning-journey-module-03.description: Third module in learning journey teaching composition of typed simplicial complexes through identification (pasting) operations
c:learning-journey-module-03.purpose: Demonstrate skill accumulation for Module 3 (composition) building on Modules 1 and 2, teaching identification as the fundamental operation for combining charts
c:learning-journey-module-03.scope: One module (composing-typed-simplicial-complexes) with 2 prerequisite skills and 1 developed skill, showing student state transition from intermediate to compositional

c:learning-journey-module-04.name: Learning Journey - Module 04
c:learning-journey-module-04.description: Fourth module in learning journey teaching verification and validation of documents using automated tools and human judgment
c:learning-journey-module-04.purpose: Demonstrate skill accumulation for Module 4 (verification & validation) building on Modules 1 and 2, teaching quality assurance fundamentals through structural verification and qualitative validation
c:learning-journey-module-04.scope: One module (verification-validation) with 1 prerequisite skill and 1 developed skill, showing student state transition from intermediate to verification learner

c:learning-journey-module-05.name: Learning Journey - Module 05
c:learning-journey-module-05.description: Fifth module in learning journey teaching assurance triangles, assurance network auditing, and boundary complex self-referential foundations
c:learning-journey-module-05.purpose: Demonstrate skill accumulation for Module 5 (assurance & audits) building on Module 4, teaching complete assurance networks and boundary complex understanding
c:learning-journey-module-05.scope: One module (assurance-audits) with 1 prerequisite skill and 1 developed skill, showing student state transition from verification-learner to assurance-learner (fork point)

c:learning-journey-module-06.name: Learning Journey - Module 06
c:learning-journey-module-06.description: Sixth module in learning journey teaching compositional document architecture using Obsidian embeds, typed subsections, and PPP framework
c:learning-journey-module-06.purpose: Demonstrate skill accumulation for Module 6 (document composition) building on Modules 3 and 5, teaching compositional architectures with systematic assurance workflows
c:learning-journey-module-06.scope: One module (document-composition) with 2 prerequisite skills (dual) and 1 developed skill, showing student state transition from assurance-learner to document-architect (convergence point)

c:learning-journey-module-07.name: Learning Journey - Module 07
c:learning-journey-module-07.description: Seventh module in learning journey teaching reference and reuse via doc-kit pattern libraries
c:learning-journey-module-07.purpose: Demonstrate skill accumulation for Module 7 (reference-reuse) building on Module 5, teaching doc-kit pattern for reusable documentation
c:learning-journey-module-07.scope: One module (reference-reuse) with 1 prerequisite skill and 1 developed skill, showing student state transition from assurance-learner to document-architect (convergence point, Path 2)

c:learning-journey-module-08.name: Learning Journey - Module 08
c:learning-journey-module-08.description: Eighth module in learning journey teaching team coordination via type extension and coordination charts
c:learning-journey-module-08.purpose: Demonstrate skill accumulation for Module 8 (team-coordination) building on Module 7, teaching type extension and organizational modeling
c:learning-journey-module-08.scope: One module (team-coordination) with 1 prerequisite skill and 1 developed skill, showing student state transition from document-architect to coordination-architect

c:learning-journey-module-09.name: Learning Journey - Module 09
c:learning-journey-module-09.description: Ninth module in learning journey teaching resource management via function and resource flow modeling
c:learning-journey-module-09.purpose: Demonstrate skill accumulation for Module 9 (resource-management) building on Module 8, teaching resource flow and management chart construction
c:learning-journey-module-09.scope: One module (resource-management) with 1 prerequisite skill and 1 developed skill, showing student state transition from coordination-architect to management-architect

c:learning-journey-module-10.name: Learning Journey - Module 10
c:learning-journey-module-10.description: Capstone module in learning journey teaching organizational topology via chart composition and Hodge analysis
c:learning-journey-module-10.purpose: Demonstrate skill accumulation for Module 10 (organizational-topology) with 3 prerequisites and 2 developed skills, achieving chief-engineer terminal state
c:learning-journey-module-10.scope: One capstone module with 3 prerequisite skills and 2 developed skills, showing student state transition from management-architect to chief-engineer

c:org:raci-coordination-chart.name: RACI Coordination Chart
c:org:raci-coordination-chart.description: Coordination chart showing team structure and RACI responsibility assignments for Platform and Product teams
c:org:raci-coordination-chart.purpose: Document team structure and RACI responsibilities for Platform and Product teams
c:org:raci-coordination-chart.scope: Two teams (Platform, Product), 5 staff, 4 roles, 3 responsibilities with RACI assignments

coordination_metadata.raci_coverage: Complete RACI for deploy, monitor, and build responsibilities

c:org:resource-management-chart.name: Resource Management Chart
c:org:resource-management-chart.description: Management chart showing resource flows through functions operated by Platform and Product teams
c:org:resource-management-chart.purpose: Document resource flows through the deployment pipeline operated by Platform and Product teams
c:org:resource-management-chart.scope: Two teams, 3 functions, 4 resources, with production and consumption flows

management_metadata.flow_description: Linear pipeline: source code → build → test → deploy → running service

c:test-tetrahedron.name: Test Tetrahedron Chart
c:test-tetrahedron.description: Minimal test chart for validating toolchain with deliberate topological hole
c:test-tetrahedron.purpose: Validate knowledge complex toolchain by providing simple structure with deliberate hole
c:test-tetrahedron.scope: 4 test vertices forming K4 complete graph, with 3 of 4 possible faces (missing beta-gamma-delta)
